welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Forest Park, where the beauty of nature meets the charm of a small town. Get ready to discover its vibrant trails, scenic views, and friendly locals â€“ we hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport primarily serves Delta Air Lines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport primarily serves Allegiant Air, Frontier Airlines, and Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport primarily serves American Airlines, United Airlines, and US Airways flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
